title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
ears to have found what he was looking for. We should speak to him and see if he wants to join our party.

The High Harper Walkthrough

Now, proceed northward until you arrive at Dantheleon's Dancing Axe located at X:-11 Y:141. Engage in conversation with the seller named Entharl Dantheleon. Entharl will bring up the topic of Jaheira. You can respond with:

Yes, it was. And she recognizes you as well. Stop lying. Jaheira has a tendency to use truth-enhancing herbs. Let's move on.
